data.text:
Sarah joined Miller-Gomes Hotel Team in January of 2024 as Team Operations Manager. Sarah began her career at Marcus & Millichap as the Dallas/Fort Worth Operations Manager for 10+ years, she gained vast experience in process management and improvement, staff onboarding, training and development, project management, brokerage/transaction management and event planning.

She served as a lead mentor, project manager and consultant on various operations projects that assisted with efficiency and productivity for operations staff and firm operations. Sarah received the Rising Star Award which is awarded to operations managers on a path of growth.

Sarah gained additional experience in loan processing and closing coordination with Four Pillars Capital Markets where she helped provide transaction support while building relationships with investors and team members. Prior to returning to Marcus & Millichap, she gained additional experience as Operations Manager of APTVEST assisting with transaction management and corporate initiatives.

Sarah received a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Mass Communications from Texas State University. Sarah is married with two children.
